Title: The Sun Also Rises
Writer: Shixing Guo, Wen Jiang, Ping Shu, Mi Ye (novel)
Actors: Wen Jiang, Joan Chen, Anthony Chau-Sang Wong, Jaycee Chan
Plot: Jiang Wen stars in his third directorial work that boasts a stellar cast including Joan Chen, Anthony Wong and Jaycee Chan. A polyptych of interconnected stories in different time-zones, ...
